title: Mastery 6/7 Token - Disenchant Option
body:
Hi,

First of all, I really enjoy the idea of mastery level 6 and 7 and think they are a good way of showing off your best champions.

However, they have one massive problem: 
It is near impossible to readily have 500 blue essence available when you want to upgrade your tokens to champion mastery, even if you disenchant most champion tokens you receive.

I would like to propose the idea of allowing the disenchantment of mastery tokens into blue essence. Not a lot maybe around 150 essence?

This would allow players to get their mastery tokens on their favorite champs. 

Let me know what you think and maybe if a Red can add to the conversation or let us know if you guys have considered this idea that would be sweet. 

Thankyou,
Warmazzta

replies.body: you realise next patch they release a buy essence for x ip right?
